title: Unleashing your superhero, Aaron Parnell the Posture Genius and the Physics of Meaning and Success
description:
Today's conversation with Aaron Parnell, author of the new book, Slouching Superhero, covers his background, his mission and his vision for vitality and meaning in life.
Any questions, you can contact Aaron via email:  info@reposturing.com
The Slouching Superhero's Guide to Achieving Great Posture https://www.amazon.com/Slouching-Superheros-Guide-Achieving-Posture-ebook/dp/B07VVT8X69/ref=sr_1_1?keywords=slouching+superhero&qid=1573086450&sr=8-1

Jordan Peterson's 12 Rules for Life begins with a story about great posture.
Jordan Peterson and Dr. Oz:  https://youtu.be/AscPHmLWo-M
